name: Krkn release v1.1.1
body:
## What's Changed
* automation: gather test results by @sandrobonazzola in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/322
* config: really default to ~ instead of /root by @sandrobonazzola in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/328
* Really use CI test results by @sandrobonazzola in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/330
* adjust vmware requirement to latest tag by @sandrobonazzola in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/343
* Adding scenarios sub folders to container creation by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/337
* Bump release version by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/344


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/compare/v1.1.0...v1.1.1

name: Krkn release v1.1.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump release version by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/325
* Fixing parts of issue #185 for PVC scenario by @shreyasar2202 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/290
* pycodestyle fixes: kraken/kubernetes/client.py by @sandrobonazzola in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/300
* Added support for ingress traffic shaping by @shreyasar2202 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/299
* pycodestyle fixes: kraken/zone_outage/actions.py by @sandrobonazzola in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/301
* pycodestyle fixes: server.py by @sandrobonazzola in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/302
* pycodestyle fixes: kraken/cerberus/setup.py by @sandrobonazzola in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/311
* server.py: change comment to pydoc by @sandrobonazzola in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/304
* pyflakes: fix imports for allowing analysis by @sandrobonazzola in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/312
* update references to github organization by @sandrobonazzola in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/310
* pycodestyle fixes: kraken/shut_down/common_shut_down_func.py by @sandrobonazzola in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/309
* pycodestyle fixes: kraken/time_actions/common_time_functions.py by @sandrobonazzola in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/308
* pycodestyle fixes: tests/test_vmware_plugin.py by @sandrobonazzola in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/315
* pycodestyle fixes: tests/test_ingress_network_plugin.py by @sandrobonazzola in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/314
* pycodestyle fixes: run_kraken.py by @sandrobonazzola in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/306
* Pycodestyle fixes: ingress_shaping.py by @sandrobonazzola in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/313
* pycodestyle fixes: kraken/pvc/pvc_scenario.py by @sandrobonazzola in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/317
* pycodestyle fixes: vmware_plugin.py by @sandrobonazzola in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/319
* refactor post action regex by @sandrobonazzola in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/320
* Document node scenario actions for VMware by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/298
* Adding stringio for security reasons by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/316

## New Contributors
* @sandrobonazzola made their first contribution in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/300

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/compare/v1.0.1...v1.1.0

name: Krkn release v1.0.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix code alignment by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/295
* Bump release version by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/296


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/compare/v1.0.0...v1.0.1

name: Krkn release v1.0.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Integrated cerberus for checking cluster health by @yashashreesuresh in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/5
* Containerize kraken by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/4
* Added python linters and enabled travis CI to run linters by @yashashreesuresh in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/15
* Iterations by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/17
* Adding updated scenarios for 3.0 powerfulseal version by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/20
* Kill random openshift running pods by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/16
* Adding kraken containerization with instructions by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/24
* Adding updated powerfulseal pip version by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/26
* Adding build own readme and linking in main readme by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/27
* Added support to kill prometheus pods by @yashashreesuresh in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/6
* Check if killed component(s) recovered by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/21
* Adding Kraken to PerfScale Pipeline by @yashashreesuresh in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/28
* Added node chaos scenarios by @yashashreesuresh in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/10
* Retry powerfulseal for post action checks by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/30
* Fix comment in config.yml by @mffiedler in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/34
* Modify documentation to improve readability by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/35
* Time skew by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/37
* Adds the ability to run a specific type of scenario multiple times by @yashashreesuresh in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/38
* Display the pod scenarios logs by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/42
* Add pyyaml to requirements by @smalleni in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/52
* Adding specifications to set up for node scenarios in aws by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/49
* Gcp nodes by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/41
* Replace kubectl exec with kubernetes client python exec by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/54
* Adding a general cloud provider file for kubelet reset and fork bomb on all clouds by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/50
* Adding a couple of layout updates in the documentation by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/55
* Litmus integration with node cpu hog experiment by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/33
* Enable support for Openstack cloud. by @arcprabh in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/61
* Add pointers to helpful resources around Kraken by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/66
* Add pod scenarios for custom app by @juliemathew in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/62
* Add support to deploy performance dashboards by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/72
* Add node level chaos scenarios for bastion node by @pravin-dsilva in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/68
* Containerization support for running Kraken on Power (ppc64le) by @pravin-dsilva in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/69
* adding contribute doc by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/73
* Fix the link in the docs by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/75
* Az nodes by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/40
* Add pointer to the new blog by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/78
* Container doc link update by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/82
* Apiserver labels by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/86
* Modifying the Dockerfile to add the needed pip3 update by @bmos299 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/88
* Fix dependency issues by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/83
* Litmus wait before cerberus integration  by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/90
* Docs: Add pointer to the litmus based scenarios by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/96
* Install pre-commit and use GitHub Actions by @amitsagtani97 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/94
* Blank node name error message by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/97
* Add dependencies needed for performance monitoring by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/93
* Correct license from MIT to Apache 2.0 by @learnitall in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/98
* Refactor code base by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/100
* Add SElinux `Z` option to the docker run install command by @obrienrobert in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/109
* Avoid circular dependencies by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/107
* Add support to scrape and index metrics by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/103
* Add support to alerting on metrics evaluation by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/113
* Adding shut down scenario for gcp, az, aws, openstack by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/102
* Pod docs by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/114
* Update the workflow by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/115
* Baremetal Node Support by @jaredoconnell in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/74
* Document pip version and add more logging by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/118
* Automate the infrastruture pieces by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/117
* Increase the granularity of cerberus checks by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/121
* Adding delete of namespaces by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/123
* Container kill by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/120
* Improve error handling by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/127
* Fix JSONDecodeError when running in OpenShift by @koflerm in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/129
* [Docs] Add instructions on how to mount custom scenarios by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/131
* Avoid namespace context switch by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/133
* Monitor user application availability during chaos by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/130
* Add more tunables for cpu hog scenario by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/134
* Run tasks in pod using Job object type by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/136
* Add zone outage scenarios by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/137
* Node mem and node io scenarios; Updating Litmus version by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/126
* Add pointer to Kraken-hub by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/141
* Container post action check by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/140
* Add support for multi-zone disruption by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/138
* Add badge for the container image by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/142
* Add a note around node-scenarios compatability by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/143
* Update litmus docs with supported scenarios by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/144
* Run all the litmus resources in a single namespace by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/148
* adding litmus logging by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/149
* Delete litmus crd's during the cleanup by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/150
* Adding specific tag version of powerfulseal by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/151
* Bump Kubernetes python version by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/154
* Time spacing fix by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/152
* Prioritize filtering on namespace to improve performance by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/153
* Pull images from quay instead of docker by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/155
* Adding validation that namespace becomes active after chaos by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/139
* Add support to block traffic to an application by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/156
* Set the location of cerberus config to match entrypoint by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/160
* adding more node clouds defined by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/159
* Adding fix for openstack node name issue by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/164
* Ignore validation for network policy creation by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/162
* Bake in azure cli needed for node scenarios by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/167
* Signal by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/158
* Expose setting the signal in the config by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/168
* Multi node name by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/166
* Remove item only when the list is not empty by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/169
* Fix issue with matching labels by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/170
* Fixing killed container no reference issue by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/172
* Ci tests by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/173
* moving readme to show README overall on main page by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/174
* Adding check for if namespace exists by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/181
* Time fix by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/183
* Added new scenario to fill up a given volumen by @agullon in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/182
* Ci tests by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/184
* Add timeout for Openstack node scenarios by @pravin-dsilva in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/188
* changing input params checks by @agullon in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/190
* Adding in link to demo by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/192
* Adding namespace or label selector error; delete_count option by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/194
* fix condition for null params from kraken-hub by @agullon in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/196
* Time issue 2 by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/197
* Node egress traffic shaping by @yogananth-subramanian in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/189
* Adding check to be sure label or namespace is not none first by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/199
* Add chaos testing guide by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/198
* Add roadmap for Kraken by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/200
* Updating testing guide with few additions by @agullon in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/205
* Adding support to run commands on more pod containers by @agullon in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/206
* Bump jinja2 version to use latest MarkupSafe by @yogananth-subramanian in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/207
* Adding chaos testing examples within Red Hat/OpenShift by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/204
* Add pointers around alerts consistency by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/208
* Update Litmus version in config_performance.yaml by @StevenBarre in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/212
* Set itsdangerous package to 2.0.1 by @yogananth-subramanian in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/214
* Alibaba cloud type and updating pre commit versioning   by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/215
* set jinja2 to 3.0.3 and werkzeug to 2.03 by @yogananth-subramanian in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/220
* Adding rebase instructions by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/221
* Update Dockerfile by @sanjacodes in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/219
* Bump Kubernetes python client version by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/223
* Revert "Bump Kubernetes python client version" by @sanjacodes in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/225
* Add build container step to PRs, change README wording by @sanjacodes in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/226
* Improve check to validate if the file is created for PVC scenario by @agullon in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/224
* Add krkn reference in the readme by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/228
* Add chaos testing guide github pages link by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/229
* Adding new quay repo and org by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/231
* need updated krkn-hub link in docker ci by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/232
* Remove contributor-unfriendly linting rules by @sanjacodes in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/236
* Add Krkn logo by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/230
* PVC fill up scenario improvement by @agullon in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/233
* Fixed small issues in docs. by @Wise-Elm in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/241
* Remove 3rd party action and use reusable workflow by @sanjacodes in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/235
* Rework node ready wait status by @obrienrobert in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/240
* Fix reusable workflows top-level reference issue by @sanjacodes in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/244
* Add option to avoid litmus uninstall before chaos run by @aaguirreRH in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/242
* Workaround for paramiko/paramiko#2038 by @janosdebugs in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/246
* Fixes incorrect command nesting in kube_burner by @janosdebugs in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/249
* Throwing exceptions in Kubernetes on failure by @janosdebugs in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/248
* Catching Unknown status of node when cluster becomes disconnected  by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/217
* Fixes #245: running docker-compose for most people by @janosdebugs in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/250
* Starts fixing small parts of issue #185 by @sanjacodes in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/256
* Remove pre-commit contributor annoyance by @sanjacodes in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/257
* Add support for setting performance-dashboards on Kubernetes by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/258
* Adding namespace deletion using kuberenetes python client by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/259
* Add support to run on Kubernetes by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/255
* Clean up and start figuring out CI failures by @sanjacodes in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/263
* Solve issue #267 by @startxfr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/268
* Updating commands to get used PVC capacity and allocate file by @agullon in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/271
* Fix installation docs with updated git repo by @harshil-codes in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/270
* Fix repo source to install azure-cli by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/278
* Continue fixing small parts of issue #185  by @shreyasar2202 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/277
* Removing cryptography pinning by @janosdebugs in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/279
* Switch to python3.9 by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/281
* Add native pod scenarios w. Arcaflow SDK by @janosdebugs in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/280
* Rework node status to use watches by @obrienrobert in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/253
* Update README by @samdoran in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/284
* Added VMware Node Scenarios by @shreyasar2202 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/285
* Create prometheus token to use for OCP versions >=4.11 by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/288
* Move plugin tests  by @paigerube14 in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/289
* Add option to skip litmus installation by @chaitanyaenr in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/292

## New Contributors
* @yashashreesuresh made their first contribution in https://github.com/redhat-chaos/krkn/pull/5
